requirements.summary: Remove the '/team' route from the App.tsx router configuration
acceptanceCriteria: The '/team' route is no longer defined in App.tsx
Navigating to '/team' results in a 404 or redirects appropriately

file_operations.description: Remove the '/team' route configuration from the TanStack Router setup. Delete the route object that maps to the Team page component, ensuring the router no longer recognizes '/team' as a valid path.

requirements.summary: Remove the 'Team' or 'Meet the Team' navigation link from the Layout component header menu
acceptanceCriteria: The Team navigation link is removed from both desktop and mobile navigation menus
No broken links remain in the header

file_operations.description: Remove the Team navigation link from both the desktop navigation menu and the mobile navigation menu in the header. Ensure all remaining navigation items (Home, Submit Case, Cases, Resources) continue to function correctly.

acceptanceCriteria: The Team.tsx file no longer exists in the pages directory
No import errors occur from removing this file

file_operations.description: Delete the Team.tsx file that displays the paranormal investigation team members. This file is no longer needed after removing the route and navigation links.
